description:
This episode I share with you a horror story of a prized terrain piece falling to the floor and getting damaged. But don't worry, I also show you how I managed to fix it, and make it look as though it never even happened.

Join "The Fellowship" & Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

Join Black Magic Craft on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

title: How To Repair Damaged Terrain (Black Magic Craft Episode 024)
